channel.title: Client Loading Error?
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)[/code]
How can I fix it so it will Run.bat right?

item.title: Client Loading Error?
item.dc:creator: @skilld_ya skilld ya
item.description:
@skilld_ya wrote:

soemthing liek this happened to me, what version of JDK u have 6 update 5?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 03:18:20 PM[/size][hr]well right click ur run.bat and click edit and make the path right so it goes to jdk 6 not jdk 2 or 3 that shoudl fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Client Loading Error?
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
